name: Ambipom
author: Scav
flavor_text: It uses its tails for everything. If it wraps both of its tails around you and gives you a squeeze, that’s proof it really likes you.

abilities.name: Primate Dexterity
abilities.effect: If any damage is done to this Pokémon by attacks, flip a coin. If heads, prevent that damage.

attacks.name: Full Tilt Fling
attacks.effect: Flip a coin for each Energy attached to this Pokémon. This attack does 60 damage for each heads.
